page.shortlink: api client api a5 buttonlists html method

argument.name: id
argument.description: The ID to use for the button list.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: The settings to use to create the button.

property.name: theme
property.description: The theme to use on the button list.

property.name: fill
property.description: By default no value is set. If a value of "width" is set then the buttons in the button list will grow to fill the available width. If a value of "height" is set then the buttons in the button list will grow to fill the available height.

property.name: disabled
property.description: If set to "true" then the button list will appear disabled. By default the value is false.

property.name: button
property.description: The settings for the individual buttons in the button list.

property.name: layout
property.description: The layout of the button. A value of "icon text" (the default) or "text icon" which will layout the "icon" and "html" horizontally. A value of "icon" or "text" will only use only "icon" or "text" in the layout. A value of "icon/text" or "text/icon" will layout the "icon" and "html" vertically. A value of "icon-text" or "text-icon" will layout the "icon" and "html" horizontally, but align them to the left and right of the button with any additional width consumed in the center of the button. In all cases the "icon" will be automatically dropped if none is specified.

property.name: style
property.description: The CSS to put on the button.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the button.

property.name: firstClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the first button in the list.

property.name: middleClassName
property.description: The class name to put on buttons in the list that are neither the first or last.

property.name: lastClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the last button in the list.

property.name: hoverClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when the user hovers over it.

property.name: pressedClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when the user presses it.

property.name: selectedClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when the button is selected.

property.name: disabledClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when the button is disabled.

property.name: disabledSelectedClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when the button is disabled and selected.

property.name: iconStyle
property.description: The CSS to put on the button icon.

property.name: iconClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button icon.

argument.name: buttons
argument.description: An array of object containing the text, icon(s), state and value of each button in the button list.

property.name: value
property.description: The value of the button.

property.name: hide
property.description: If true then the button will not appear in the list. The default is false.

property.name: disabled
property.description: If true then the button will not appear in the list. The default is false.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to put in the button.

property.name: icon
property.description: The icon to put in the button. See *[link:A5.u.icon]*.

property.name: hoverIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when the user hovers over it. See *[link:A5.u.icon]*.

property.name: pressedIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when it is pressed. See *[link:A5.u.icon]*.

property.name: disabledIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when it is disabled. See *[link:A5.u.icon]*.

property.name: disabledSelectedIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when it is disabled and selected. See *[link:A5.u.icon]*.

property.name: tip
property.description: The TITLE attribute to put in the button that will appear as a tool tip when the user hovers over the button.

argument.name: values
argument.description: The value(s) to select in the button list.

argument.name: attributes
argument.description: Any other HTML attributes that want to be included on the BUTTON tags in the list. Two placeholders will be replaced for each specific button: "{index}" and "{value}", the index in the data and value of the button in the data respectively.

return.name: html
return.description: The resulting HTML for the given button list.

page.description: Create a button list HTML string.
